verses.verse: And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> And <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Is it not for you to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>?

"You who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> Who <S%H1497>tear<s%> <S%H1497>off<s%> their <S%H5785>skin<s%> from them And their <S%H7607>flesh<s%> from their <S%H6106>bones,<s%>

And <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7607>flesh<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6584>Strip<s%> <S%H6584>off<s%> their <S%H5785>skin<s%> from them, <S%H6476>Break<s%> their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> And <S%H6566>chop<s%> [them] up as for the <S%H5518>pot<s%> And as <S%H1320>meat<s%> in a <S%H7037>kettle.<s%> "

<S%H227>Then<s%> they will <S%H2199>cry<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> But He will not <S%H6030>answer<s%> them. Instead, He will <S%H5641>hide<s%> His <S%H6440>face<s%> from them at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H834>Because<s%> they have <S%H7489>practiced<s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> Who <S%H8582>lead<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8582>astray;<s%> When they have [something] to <S%H5391>bite<s%> with their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> They <S%H7121>cry,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peace,<s%>" But <S%H5921>against<s%> him <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>puts<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> They <S%H6942>declare<s%> <S%H6942>holy<s%> <S%H4421>war.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> [it will be] <S%H3915>night<s%> for you – <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2377>vision,<s%> And <S%H2825>darkness<s%> for you – <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H7080>divination.<s%> The <S%H8121>sun<s%> will <S%H935>go<s%> down on the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> And the <S%H3117>day<s%> will <S%H6937>become<s%> <S%H6937>dark<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

The <S%H2374>seers<s%> will be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> And the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> will be <S%H2659>embarrassed.<s%> Indeed, they will <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5844>cover<s%> [their] <S%H8222>mouths<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4617>answer<s%> from <S%H430>God.<s%>

On the <S%H199>other<s%> <S%H199>hand<s%> I am <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3581>power<s%> – With the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> – And with <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H1369>courage<s%> To <S%H5046>make<s%> <S%H5046>known<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H6588>rebellious<s%> <S%H6588>act,<s%> Even to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H9128>sin.<s%>

<S%H4994>Now<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> And <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Who <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> And <S%H6140>twist<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> that is <S%H3477>straight,<s%>

Her <S%H7218>leaders<s%> <S%H8199>pronounce<s%> <S%H8199>judgment<s%> for a <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3384>instruct<s%> for a <S%H4242>price,<s%> And her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7080>divine<s%> for <S%H3701>money.<s%> Yet they <S%H8172>lean<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Is not the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in our <S%H7130>midst<s%>? <S%H9567>Calamity<s%> will not <S%H935>come<s%> upon us."

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> on <S%H1558>account<s%> of you, <S%H6726>Zion<s%> will be <S%H9177>plowed<s%> as a <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H5856>heap<s%> of <S%H5856>ruins,<s%> And the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple<s%> [will become] <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> of a <S%H9194>forest.<s%>
